Kaikōura earthquake linked to unrest at Taupō supervolcano https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/surprise-findings-kaikoura-earthquake-linked-to-unrest-at-taupo-supervolcano-500km-away/WXW5Y5D2AZBU5HWVRNZVYIDXQI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/surprise-findings-kaikoura-earthquake-linked-to-unrest-at-taupo-supervolcano-500km-away/WXW5Y5D2AZBU5HWVRNZVYIDXQI/ Jamie MortonIt’s been a question on the minds of geoscientists - can big quakes trigger eruptions? Sun, 19 May 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Involving more than 20 faults, 2016's magnitude-7.8 Kaikōura earthquake was one of the most complex ever observed in the world. Now, a new study has linked its shaking to unrest at the Taupō supervolcano.
